00070 void EnableEditorRegion( INT8 bRegionID )
00071 {
00072       switch( bRegionID )
00073       {
00074             case BASE_TERRAIN_TILE_REGION_ID:
00075             case 1: case 2: case 3: case 4: case 5: case 6: case 7: case 8:
00076                   MSYS_EnableRegion( &TerrainTileButtonRegion[ bRegionID ] );
00077                   break;
00078             case ITEM_REGION_ID:
00079                   MSYS_EnableRegion( &ItemsRegion );
00080                   break;
00081             case MERC_REGION_ID:
00082                   MSYS_EnableRegion( &MercRegion );
00083                   break;
00084       }
00085 }
00086 
00087 void DisableEditorRegion( INT8      bRegionID )
00088 {
00089       switch( bRegionID )
00090       {
00091             case BASE_TERRAIN_TILE_REGION_ID:
00092             case 1: case 2: case 3: case 4: case 5: case 6: case 7:
00093                   MSYS_DisableRegion( &TerrainTileButtonRegion[ bRegionID ] );
00094                   break;
00095             case ITEM_REGION_ID:
00096                   MSYS_DisableRegion( &ItemsRegion );
00097                   break;
00098             case MERC_REGION_ID:
00099                   MSYS_DisableRegion( &MercRegion );
00100                   break;
00101       }
00102 }
00103 
00104 void RemoveEditorRegions()
00105 {
00106       INT32 x;
00107       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &EditorRegion );
00108       for(x = BASE_TERRAIN_TILE_REGION_ID; x < NUM_TERRAIN_TILE_REGIONS; x++ )
00109       {
00110             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &TerrainTileButtonRegion[ x ] );
00111       }
00112       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &ItemsRegion );
00113       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &MercRegion );
00114 }
00115 
00116 void InitEditorRegions()
00117 {
00118       INT32 x;
00119 
00120       //By doing this, all of the buttons underneath are blanketed and can't be used anymore.
00121       //Any new buttons will cover this up as well.  Think of it as a barrier between the editor buttons,
00122       //and the game's interface panel buttons and regions.
00123       MSYS_DefineRegion( &EditorRegion, 0, 360, 640, 480, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, 0, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
00124 
00125       //Create the regions for the terrain tile selections
00126       for( x = 0; x < NUM_TERRAIN_TILE_REGIONS; x++ )
00127       {
00128             MSYS_DefineRegion(&TerrainTileButtonRegion[x],(INT16)(261+x*42),369,(INT16)(303+x*42),391,
00129                   MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, 0, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK,(MOUSE_CALLBACK)TerrainTileButtonRegionCallback);
00130             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &TerrainTileButtonRegion[x], 0, x );
00131             MSYS_DisableRegion( &TerrainTileButtonRegion[x] );
00132       }
00133       gfShowTerrainTileButtons=FALSE;
00134 
00135       //Create the region for the items selection window.
00136       MSYS_DefineRegion( &ItemsRegion, 100, 360, 540, 440, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, 0, 
00137             (MOUSE_CALLBACK)MouseMovedInItemsRegion, (MOUSE_CALLBACK)MouseClickedInItemsRegion );
00138       MSYS_DisableRegion( &ItemsRegion );
00139 
00140       //Create the region for the merc inventory panel.
00141       MSYS_DefineRegion( &MercRegion, 175, 361, 450, 460, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, 0, 
00142             MouseMovedInMercRegion, MouseClickedInMercRegion );
00143       MSYS_DisableRegion( &MercRegion );
00144 }
00145 
00146 void LoadEditorImages()
00147 {
00148   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00149 
00150       //Set up the merc inventory panel
00151       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00152       sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "EDITOR\\InvPanel.sti" );
00153       if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiMercInventoryPanel ) )
00154             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load data\\editor\\InvPanel.sti" );
00155       //Set up small omerta map
00156       sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "EDITOR\\omerta.sti" );
00157       if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiOmertaMap ) )
00158             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load data\\editor\\omerta.sti" );
00159       //Set up the merc directional buttons.
00160       giEditMercDirectionIcons[0] = LoadGenericButtonIcon("EDITOR//arrowsoff.sti");
00161       giEditMercDirectionIcons[1] = LoadGenericButtonIcon("EDITOR//arrowson.sti");
00162 
00163       giEditMercImage[0] = LoadButtonImage("EDITOR\\leftarrow.sti",0,1,2,3,4);
00164       giEditMercImage[1] = LoadButtonImage("EDITOR\\rightarrow.sti",0,1,2,3,4);
00165 
00166       sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "EDITOR\\Exclamation.sti" );
00167       if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiExclamation ) )
00168             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load data\\editor\\Exclamation.sti" );
00169       sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "EDITOR\\KeyImage.sti" );
00170       if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiKeyImage ) )
00171             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load data\\editor\\KeyImage.sti" );
00172 }
00173 
00174 void DeleteEditorImages()
00175 {
00176       //The merc inventory panel
00177       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiMercInventoryPanel );
00178       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiOmertaMap );
00179       //The merc directional buttons
00180       UnloadGenericButtonIcon( (INT16)giEditMercDirectionIcons[0] );
00181       UnloadGenericButtonIcon( (INT16)giEditMercDirectionIcons[1] );
00182 
00183       UnloadButtonImage( giEditMercImage[0] );
00184       UnloadButtonImage( giEditMercImage[1] );
00185 }
00186 
00187 void CreateEditorBuffers()
00188 {
00189 
00190       INT32                               i;
00191       VSURFACE_DESC           vs_desc;
00192       UINT16                              usUselessWidth, usUselessHeight;
00193       UINT8                               ubBitDepth;
00194 
00195       //create buffer for the transition slot for merc items.  This slot contains the newly
00196       //selected item graphic in it's inventory size version.  This buffer is then scaled down
00197       //into the associated merc inventory panel slot buffer which is approximately 20% smaller.
00198       GetCurrentVideoSettings( &usUselessWidth, &usUselessHeight, &ubBitDepth );
00199       vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_DEFAULT | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
00200       vs_desc.usWidth = 60;
00201       vs_desc.usHeight = 25;
00202       vs_desc.ubBitDepth = ubBitDepth;
00203       if( !AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, &guiMercTempBuffer ) )
00204             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to allocate memory for merc tempitem buffer." );
00205 
00206       //create the nine buffers for the merc's inventory slots.
00207       vs_desc.usHeight = MERCINV_SLOT_HEIGHT;
00208       for( i = 0; i < 9; i++ )
00209       {
00210             vs_desc.usWidth = i<3 ? MERCINV_SMSLOT_WIDTH : MERCINV_LGSLOT_WIDTH;
00211             if( !AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, &guiMercInvPanelBuffers[i] ) )
00212                   AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to allocate memory for merc item[] buffers." );
00213       }
00214 }
00215 
00216 void DeleteEditorBuffers()
00217 {
00218       INT32 i;
00219       DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex( guiMercTempBuffer );
00220       for( i = 0; i < 9; i++ )
00221       {
00222             DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex( guiMercInvPanelBuffers[ i ] );
00223       }
00224 }
00225 
00226 void ShowEditorToolbar( INT32 iNewTaskMode )
00227 {
00228       switch( iNewTaskMode )
00229       {
00230             case TASK_TERRAIN:            ShowEditorButtons( FIRST_TERRAIN_BUTTON, LAST_TERRAIN_BUTTON );                                             break;
00231             case TASK_BUILDINGS:    ShowEditorButtons( FIRST_BUILDINGS_BUTTON, LAST_BUILDINGS_BUTTON );                                   break;
00232             case TASK_ITEMS:              ShowEditorButtons( FIRST_ITEMS_BUTTON, LAST_ITEMS_BUTTON );                                                       break;
00233             case TASK_MERCS:              ShowEditorButtons( FIRST_MERCS_TEAMMODE_BUTTON, LAST_MERCS_TEAMMODE_BUTTON ); break;
00234             case TASK_MAPINFO:            ShowEditorButtons( FIRST_MAPINFO_BUTTON, LAST_MAPINFO_BUTTON );                                             break;
00235             case TASK_OPTIONS:            ShowEditorButtons( FIRST_OPTIONS_BUTTON, LAST_OPTIONS_BUTTON );                                             break;
00236             default:          return;
00237       }
00238 }
00239 
00240 void HideEditorToolbar( INT32 iOldTaskMode )
00241 {
00242       INT32 i, iStart, iEnd;
00243       switch( iOldTaskMode )
00244       {
00245             case TASK_TERRAIN:            iStart = FIRST_TERRAIN_BUTTON;                  iEnd = LAST_TERRAIN_BUTTON;               break;
00246             case TASK_BUILDINGS:    iStart = FIRST_BUILDINGS_BUTTON;          iEnd = LAST_BUILDINGS_BUTTON;       break;
00247             case TASK_ITEMS:              iStart = FIRST_ITEMS_BUTTON;                    iEnd = LAST_ITEMS_BUTTON;                       break;
00248             case TASK_MERCS:              iStart = FIRST_MERCS_BUTTON;                    iEnd = LAST_MERCS_BUTTON;                       break;
00249             case TASK_MAPINFO:            iStart = FIRST_MAPINFO_BUTTON;                  iEnd = LAST_MAPINFO_BUTTON;         break;
00250             case TASK_OPTIONS:            iStart = FIRST_OPTIONS_BUTTON;                  iEnd = LAST_OPTIONS_BUTTON;               break;
00251             default:          return;
00252       }
00253       for( i = iStart; i <= iEnd; i++ )
00254       {
00255             HideButton( iEditorButton[ i ] );
00256             UnclickEditorButton( i );
00257       }
00258 }
00259 
00260 void CreateEditorTaskbar()
00261 {
00262       InitEditorRegions();
00263       LoadEditorImages();
00264       CreateEditorBuffers();
00265       CreateEditorTaskbarInternal();
00266       HideItemStatsPanel();
00267 }
00268 
00269 void DeleteEditorTaskbar()
00270 {
00271       INT32 x;
00272 
00273       iOldTaskMode = iCurrentTaskbar;
00274 
00275       for( x = 0; x < NUMBER_EDITOR_BUTTONS; x++ )
00276             RemoveButton( iEditorButton[ x ] );
00277 
00278       RemoveEditorRegions();
00279       DeleteEditorImages();
00280       DeleteEditorBuffers();
00281 
00282 }
00283 
00284 void DoTaskbar(void)
00285 {
00286       if(!iTaskMode || iTaskMode == iCurrentTaskbar )
00287       {
00288             return;
00289       }
00290 
00291       gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
00292       
00293       HideEditorToolbar( iCurrentTaskbar );
00294 
00295       //Special code when exiting previous editor tab
00296       switch( iCurrentTaskbar )
00297       {
00298             case TASK_TERRAIN:
00299                   UnclickEditorButton( TAB_TERRAIN );
00300                   HideTerrainTileButtons();
00301                   break;
00302             case TASK_BUILDINGS:
00303                   UnclickEditorButton( TAB_BUILDINGS );
00304                   KillTextInputMode();
00305                   break;
00306             case TASK_ITEMS:
00307                   UnclickEditorButton( TAB_ITEMS );
00308                   HideItemStatsPanel();
00309                   if( eInfo.fActive )
00310                         ClearEditorItemsInfo();
00311                   gfShowPits = FALSE;
00312                   RemoveAllPits();
00313                   break;
00314             case TASK_MERCS:
00315                   UnclickEditorButton( TAB_MERCS );
00316                   IndicateSelectedMerc( SELECT_NO_MERC );
00317                   SetMercEditingMode( MERC_NOMODE );
00318                   break;
00319             case TASK_MAPINFO:
00320                   UnclickEditorButton( TAB_MAPINFO );
00321                   ExtractAndUpdateMapInfo();
00322                   KillTextInputMode();
00323                   HideExitGrids();
00324                   break;
00325             case TASK_OPTIONS:
00326                   UnclickEditorButton( TAB_OPTIONS );
00327                   break;
00328       }
00329 
00330       //Setup the new tab mode
00331       iCurrentTaskbar = iTaskMode;
00332       ShowEditorToolbar( iTaskMode );
00333       iTaskMode = TASK_NONE;
00334 
00335       //Special code when entering a new editor tab
00336       switch( iCurrentTaskbar )
00337       {
00338             case TASK_MERCS:
00339                   ClickEditorButton( TAB_MERCS );
00340                   ClickEditorButton( MERCS_ENEMY);
00341                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_ENEMY;
00342                   SetMercEditingMode( MERC_TEAMMODE );
00343                   fBuildingShowRoofs = FALSE;
00344                   UpdateRoofsView();
00345                   break;
00346             case TASK_TERRAIN:
00347                   ClickEditorButton( TAB_TERRAIN );
00348                   ShowTerrainTileButtons();
00349                   SetEditorTerrainTaskbarMode( TERRAIN_FGROUND_TEXTURES );
00350                   break;
00351             case TASK_BUILDINGS:
00352                   ClickEditorButton( TAB_BUILDINGS );
00353                   if(fBuildingShowRoofs) 
00354                         ClickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_ROOF_VIEW );
00355                   if(fBuildingShowWalls)
00356                         ClickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_WALL_VIEW );
00357                   if(fBuildingShowRoomInfo)
00358                         ClickEditorButton( BUILDING_TOGGLE_INFO_VIEW );
00359                   if( gfCaves )
00360                   {
00361                         ClickEditorButton( BUILDING_CAVE_DRAWING );
00362                         iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_CAVES;
00363                   }
00364                   else
00365                   {
00366                         ClickEditorButton( BUILDING_NEW_ROOM );
00367                         iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_ROOM;
00368                   }
00369                   TerrainTileDrawMode = TERRAIN_TILES_BRETS_STRANGEMODE;
00370                   SetEditorSmoothingMode( gMapInformation.ubEditorSmoothingType );
00371                   gusSelectionType = gusSavedBuildingSelectionType;
00372                   SetupTextInputForBuildings();
00373                   break;
00374             case TASK_ITEMS:
00375                   SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
00376                   SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00377                   ClickEditorButton( TAB_ITEMS );
00378                   ClickEditorButton( ITEMS_WEAPONS + eInfo.uiItemType - TBAR_MODE_ITEM_WEAPONS );
00379                   InitEditorItemsInfo( eInfo.uiItemType );
00380                   ShowItemStatsPanel();
00381                   gfShowPits = TRUE;
00382                   AddAllPits();
00383                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_PLACE_ITEM;
00384                   break;
00385             case TASK_MAPINFO:
00386                   ClickEditorButton( TAB_MAPINFO );
00387                   if ( gfFakeLights )
00388                         ClickEditorButton( MAPINFO_TOGGLE_FAKE_LIGHTS );
00389                   ClickEditorButton( MAPINFO_ADD_LIGHT1_SOURCE );
00390                   iDrawMode = DRAW_MODE_LIGHT;
00391                   TerrainTileDrawMode = TERRAIN_TILES_BRETS_STRANGEMODE;
00392                   SetupTextInputForMapInfo();
00393                   break;
00394             case TASK_OPTIONS:
00395                   ClickEditorButton( TAB_OPTIONS );
00396                   TerrainTileDrawMode = TERRAIN_TILES_NODRAW;
00397                   break;
00398       }
00399 }

00401 //Disables the task bar, but leaves it on screen. Used when a selection window is up.
00402 void DisableEditorTaskbar(void)
00403 {
00404       INT32 x;
00405       for(x = 0; x < NUMBER_EDITOR_BUTTONS; x++ )
00406             DisableButton( iEditorButton[ x ] );
00407 }

00410 void EnableEditorTaskbar(void)
00411 {
00412       INT32 x;
00413       
00414       for(x = 0; x < NUMBER_EDITOR_BUTTONS; x++ )
00415             EnableButton( iEditorButton[ x ] );
00416       //Keep permanent buttons disabled.
00417       DisableButton( iEditorButton[ MERCS_1 ] );
00418       DisableButton( iEditorButton[ MAPINFO_LIGHT_PANEL ] );
00419       DisableButton( iEditorButton[ MAPINFO_RADIO_PANEL ] );
00420       DisableButton( iEditorButton[ ITEMSTATS_PANEL ] );
00421       DisableButton( iEditorButton[ MERCS_PLAYERTOGGLE ] );
00422       DisableButton( iEditorButton[ MERCS_PLAYER ] );
00423       if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_ITEMS )
00424             DetermineItemsScrolling();
00425 }
00426 
00427 //A specialized mprint function that'll restore the editor panel underneath the
00428 //string before rendering the string.  This is obviously only useful for drawing text
00429 //in the editor taskbar.
00430 void mprintfEditor(INT16 x, INT16 y, UINT16 *pFontString, ...)
00431 {
00432       va_list argptr;
00433       wchar_t     string[512];
00434       UINT16 uiStringLength, uiStringHeight;
00435 
00436       Assert( pFontString != NULL );
00437 
00438       va_start( argptr, pFontString );          // Set up variable argument pointer
00439       vswprintf( string, pFontString, argptr);  // process gprintf string (get output str)
00440       va_end( argptr );
00441 
00442       uiStringLength = StringPixLength( string, FontDefault );
00443       uiStringHeight = GetFontHeight( FontDefault );
00444 
00445       ClearTaskbarRegion( x, y, (INT16)(x+uiStringLength), (INT16)(y+uiStringHeight) );
00446       mprintf( x, y, string );
00447 }
00448 
00449 void ClearTaskbarRegion( INT16 sLeft, INT16 sTop, INT16 sRight, INT16 sBottom )
00450 {
00451       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( ButtonDestBuffer, sLeft, sTop, sRight, sBottom, gusEditorTaskbarColor );
00452 
00453       if( !sLeft )
00454       {
00455             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( ButtonDestBuffer, 0, sTop, 1, sBottom, gusEditorTaskbarHiColor );
00456             sLeft++;
00457       }
00458       if( sTop == 360 )
00459       {
00460             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( ButtonDestBuffer, sLeft, 360, sRight, 361, gusEditorTaskbarHiColor );
00461             sTop++;
00462       }
00463       if( sBottom == 480 )
00464             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( ButtonDestBuffer, sLeft, 479, sRight, 480, gusEditorTaskbarLoColor );
00465       if( sRight == 640 )
00466             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( ButtonDestBuffer, 639, sTop, 640, sBottom, gusEditorTaskbarLoColor );
00467 
00468       InvalidateRegion( sLeft, sTop, sRight, sBottom );
00469 }
00470 
00471 
00472 //Kris:
00473 //This is a new function which duplicates the older "yellow info boxes" that
00474 //are common throughout the editor.  This draws the yellow box with the indentation
00475 //look.
00476 void DrawEditorInfoBox( UINT16 *str, UINT32 uiFont, UINT16 x, UINT16 y, UINT16 w, UINT16 h )
00477 {
00478       UINT16 usFillColorDark, usFillColorLight, usFillColorBack;
00479       UINT16 x2, y2;
00480       UINT16 usStrWidth;
00481 
00482       x2 = x + w;
00483       y2 = y + h;
00484 
00485       usFillColorDark = Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(24, 61, 81));
00486       usFillColorLight = Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(136, 138, 135));
00487       usFillColorBack = Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(250, 240, 188));
00488 
00489       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(ButtonDestBuffer, x, y, x2, y2, usFillColorDark);
00490       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(ButtonDestBuffer, x + 1, y + 1, x2, y2, usFillColorLight);
00491       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(ButtonDestBuffer, x + 1, y + 1, x2 - 1, y2 - 1, usFillColorBack);
00492 
00493       usStrWidth = StringPixLength( str, uiFont );
00494       if( usStrWidth > w )
00495       { //the string is too long, so use the wrapped method
00496             y += 1;
00497             DisplayWrappedString( x, y, w, 2, uiFont, FONT_BLACK, str, FONT_BLACK, TRUE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00498             return;
00499       }
00500       //center the string vertically and horizontally.
00501       SetFont( uiFont );
00502       SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
00503       SetFontShadow( FONT_BLACK );
00504       x += (w - (UINT16)StringPixLength( str, uiFont )) / 2;
00505       y += (h - (UINT16)GetFontHeight( uiFont)) / 2;
00506       mprintf( x, y, L"%s", str );
00507       InvalidateRegion( x, y, x2, y2 );
00508 }
00509 
00510 void ClickEditorButton( INT32 iEditorButtonID )
00511 {
00512       GUI_BUTTON *butn;
00513       if ( iEditorButtonID < 0 || iEditorButtonID >= NUMBER_EDITOR_BUTTONS )
00514             return;
00515       if ( iEditorButton[ iEditorButtonID ] != -1 )
00516       {
00517             butn = ButtonList[ iEditorButton[ iEditorButtonID ] ];
00518             if( butn )
00519                   butn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00520       }
00521 }
00522 
00523 void UnclickEditorButton( INT32 iEditorButtonID )
00524 {
00525       GUI_BUTTON *butn;
00526       if ( iEditorButtonID < 0 || iEditorButtonID >= NUMBER_EDITOR_BUTTONS )
00527             return;
00528       if ( iEditorButton[ iEditorButtonID ] != -1 )
00529       {
00530             butn = ButtonList[ iEditorButton[ iEditorButtonID ] ];
00531             if( butn )
00532                   butn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00533       }
00534 }
00535

00547 {

00552 {

00556 void ClickEditorButtons( INT32 iFirstEditorButtonID, INT32 iLastEditorButtonID )
00557 {
00558       INT32 i;
00559       GUI_BUTTON *b;
00560       for( i = iFirstEditorButtonID; i <= iLastEditorButtonID; i++ )
00561       {
00562             Assert( iEditorButton[ i ] != -1 );
00563             b = ButtonList[ iEditorButton[ i ] ];
00564             Assert( b );
00565             b->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00566       }
00567 }
00568 
00569 void UnclickEditorButtons( INT32 iFirstEditorButtonID, INT32 iLastEditorButtonID )
00570 {
00571       INT32 i;
00572       GUI_BUTTON *b;
00573       for( i = iFirstEditorButtonID; i <= iLastEditorButtonID; i++ )
00574       {
00575             Assert( iEditorButton[ i ] != -1 );
00576             b = ButtonList[ iEditorButton[ i ] ];
00577             Assert( b );
00578             b->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00579       }
00580 }
00581 
00582 void HideEditorButtons( INT32 iFirstEditorButtonID, INT32 iLastEditorButtonID )
00583 {
00584       INT32 i;
00585       for( i = iFirstEditorButtonID; i <= iLastEditorButtonID; i++ )
00586             HideButton( iEditorButton[ i ] );
00587 }
00588 
00589 void ShowEditorButtons( INT32 iFirstEditorButtonID, INT32 iLastEditorButtonID )
00590 {
00591       INT32 i;
00592       for( i = iFirstEditorButtonID; i <= iLastEditorButtonID; i++ )
00593             ShowButton( iEditorButton[ i ] );
00594 }
00595 
00596 void DisableEditorButtons( INT32 iFirstEditorButtonID, INT32 iLastEditorButtonID )
00597 {
00598       INT32 i;
00599       for( i = iFirstEditorButtonID; i <= iLastEditorButtonID; i++ )
00600             DisableButton( iEditorButton[ i ] );
00601 }
00602 
00603 void EnableEditorButtons( INT32 iFirstEditorButtonID, INT32 iLastEditorButtonID )
00604 {
00605       INT32 i;
00606       for( i = iFirstEditorButtonID; i <= iLastEditorButtonID; i++ )
00607             EnableButton( iEditorButton[ i ] );
00608 }
00609 
00610 void RenderMapEntryPointsAndLights()
00611 {
00612       INT16 sGridNo;
00613       INT16 sScreenX, sScreenY;
00614       INT32 i;
00615       if( gfSummaryWindowActive )
00616             return;
00617       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
00618       SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00619       SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
00620       sGridNo = gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo;
00621       if( sGridNo != -1 )
00622       {
00623             GetGridNoScreenPos( sGridNo, 0, &sScreenX, &sScreenY );
00624             if( sScreenY >= -20 && sScreenY < 340 && sScreenX >= -40  && sScreenX < 640 )
00625             {
00626                   DisplayWrappedString( sScreenX, (INT16)(sScreenY-5), 40, 2, FONT10ARIAL, FONT_YELLOW, L"North Entry Point", FONT_BLACK, TRUE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00627             }
00628       }
00629       sGridNo = gMapInformation.sWestGridNo;
00630       if( sGridNo != -1 )
00631       {
00632             GetGridNoScreenPos( sGridNo, 0, &sScreenX, &sScreenY );
00633             if( sScreenY >= -20 && sScreenY < 340 && sScreenX >= -40  && sScreenX < 640 )
00634             {
00635                   DisplayWrappedString( sScreenX, (INT16)(sScreenY-5), 40, 2, FONT10ARIAL, FONT_YELLOW, L"West Entry Point", FONT_BLACK, TRUE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00636             }
00637       }
00638       sGridNo = gMapInformation.sEastGridNo;
00639       if( sGridNo != -1 )
00640       {
00641             GetGridNoScreenPos( sGridNo, 0, &sScreenX, &sScreenY );
00642             if( sScreenY >= -20 && sScreenY < 340 && sScreenX >= -40  && sScreenX < 640 )
00643             {
00644                   DisplayWrappedString( sScreenX, (INT16)(sScreenY-5), 40, 2, FONT10ARIAL, FONT_YELLOW, L"East Entry Point", FONT_BLACK, TRUE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00645             }
00646       }
00647       sGridNo = gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo;
00648       if( sGridNo != -1 )
00649       {
00650             GetGridNoScreenPos( sGridNo, 0, &sScreenX, &sScreenY );
00651             if( sScreenY >= -20 && sScreenY < 340 && sScreenX >= -40  && sScreenX < 640 )
00652             {
00653                   DisplayWrappedString( sScreenX, (INT16)(sScreenY-5), 40, 2, FONT10ARIAL, FONT_YELLOW, L"South Entry Point", FONT_BLACK, TRUE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00654             }
00655       }
00656       sGridNo = gMapInformation.sCenterGridNo;
00657       if( sGridNo != -1 )
00658       {
00659             GetGridNoScreenPos( sGridNo, 0, &sScreenX, &sScreenY );
00660             if( sScreenY >= -20 && sScreenY < 340 && sScreenX >= -40  && sScreenX < 640 )
00661             {
00662                   DisplayWrappedString( sScreenX, (INT16)(sScreenY-5), 40, 2, FONT10ARIAL, FONT_YELLOW, L"Center Entry Point", FONT_BLACK, TRUE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00663             }
00664       }
00665       sGridNo = gMapInformation.sIsolatedGridNo;
00666       if( sGridNo != -1 )
00667       {
00668             GetGridNoScreenPos( sGridNo, 0, &sScreenX, &sScreenY );
00669             if( sScreenY >= -20 && sScreenY < 340 && sScreenX >= -40  && sScreenX < 640 )
00670             {
00671                   DisplayWrappedString( sScreenX, (INT16)(sScreenY-5), 40, 2, FONT10ARIAL, FONT_YELLOW, L"Isolated Entry Point", FONT_BLACK, TRUE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00672             }
00673       }
00674       //Do the lights now.
00675       for( i = 0; i < MAX_LIGHT_SPRITES; i++ )
00676       {
00677             if( LightSprites[ i ].uiFlags & LIGHT_SPR_ACTIVE )
00678             {
00679                   sGridNo = LightSprites[ i ].iY * WORLD_COLS + LightSprites[ i ].iX;
00680                   GetGridNoScreenPos( sGridNo, 0, &sScreenX, &sScreenY );
00681                   if( sScreenY >= -50 && sScreenY < 300 && sScreenX >= -40  && sScreenX < 640 )
00682                   {
00683                         if( LightSprites[ i ].uiFlags & LIGHT_PRIMETIME )
00684                               DisplayWrappedString( sScreenX, (INT16)(sScreenY-5), 50, 2, FONT10ARIAL, FONT_ORANGE, L"Prime", FONT_BLACK, TRUE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00685                         else if( LightSprites[ i ].uiFlags & LIGHT_NIGHTTIME )
00686                               DisplayWrappedString( sScreenX, (INT16)(sScreenY-5), 50, 2, FONT10ARIAL, FONT_RED, L"Night", FONT_BLACK, TRUE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00687                         else
00688                               DisplayWrappedString( sScreenX, (INT16)(sScreenY-5), 50, 2, FONT10ARIAL, FONT_YELLOW, L"24Hour", FONT_BLACK, TRUE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00689                   }
00690             }
00691       }
00692 }
00693 
00694 void BuildTriggerName( OBJECTTYPE *pItem, UINT16 *szItemName )
00695 {
00696       if( pItem->usItem == SWITCH )
00697       {
00698             if( pItem->bFrequency == PANIC_FREQUENCY )
00699                   swprintf( szItemName, L"Panic Trigger1" );
00700             else if( pItem->bFrequency == PANIC_FREQUENCY_2 )
00701                   swprintf( szItemName, L"Panic Trigger2" );
00702             else if( pItem->bFrequency == PANIC_FREQUENCY_3 )
00703                   swprintf( szItemName, L"Panic Trigger3" );
00704             else
00705                   swprintf( szItemName, L"Trigger%d", pItem->bFrequency - 50 );
00706       }
00707       else
00708       { //action item
00709             if( pItem->bDetonatorType == BOMB_PRESSURE )
00710                   swprintf( szItemName, L"Pressure Action" );
00711             else if( pItem->bFrequency == PANIC_FREQUENCY )
00712                   swprintf( szItemName, L"Panic Action1" );
00713             else if( pItem->bFrequency == PANIC_FREQUENCY_2 )
00714                   swprintf( szItemName, L"Panic Action2" );
00715             else if( pItem->bFrequency == PANIC_FREQUENCY_3 )
00716                   swprintf( szItemName, L"Panic Action3" );
00717             else
00718                   swprintf( szItemName, L"Action%d", pItem->bFrequency - 50 );
00719       }
00720 }
00721 
00722 void RenderDoorLockInfo()
00723 {
00724       INT16 i, xp, yp;
00725       INT16 sScreenX, sScreenY;
00726       UINT16 str[ 50 ];
00727       for( i = 0; i < gubNumDoors; i++ )
00728       {
00729             GetGridNoScreenPos( DoorTable[ i ].sGridNo, 0, &sScreenX, &sScreenY );
00730             if( sScreenY > 390 )
00731                   continue;
00732             if( DoorTable[ i ].ubLockID != 255 )
00733                   swprintf( str, L"%S", LockTable[ DoorTable[ i ].ubLockID ].ubEditorName );
00734             else
00735                   swprintf( str, L"No Lock ID" );
00736             xp = sScreenX - 10;
00737             yp = sScreenY - 40;
00738             DisplayWrappedString( xp, yp, 60, 2, FONT10ARIAL, FONT_LTKHAKI, str, FONT_BLACK, TRUE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00739             if( DoorTable[ i ].ubTrapID )
00740             {
00741                   SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
00742                   SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
00743                   SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
00744                   switch( DoorTable[ i ].ubTrapID )
00745                   {
00746                         case EXPLOSION:
00747                               swprintf( str, L"Explosion Trap" );
00748                               break;
00749                         case ELECTRIC:
00750                               swprintf( str, L"Electric Trap" );
00751                               break;
00752                         case SIREN:
00753                               swprintf( str, L"Siren Trap" );
00754                               break;
00755                         case SILENT_ALARM:
00756                               swprintf( str, L"Silent Alarm" );
00757                               break;
00758                         case SUPER_ELECTRIC:
00759                               swprintf( str, L"Super Electric Trap" );
00760                               break;
00761 
00762                   }
00763                   xp = sScreenX + 20 - StringPixLength( str, FONT10ARIAL ) / 2;
00764                   yp = sScreenY;
00765                   mprintf( xp, yp, str );
00766                   swprintf( str, L"Trap Level %d", DoorTable[ i ].ubTrapLevel );
00767                   xp = sScreenX + 20 - StringPixLength( str, FONT10ARIAL ) / 2;
00768                   mprintf( xp, yp+10, str );
00769             }
00770       }
00771 }
00772 
00773 void RenderSelectedItemBlownUp()
00774 {
00775       UINT32 uiVideoObjectIndex;
00776       HVOBJECT hVObject;
00777       INT16 sScreenX, sScreenY, xp, yp;
00778       ITEM_POOL   *pItemPool;
00779       UINT16 szItemName[ SIZE_ITEM_NAME ];
00780       INT32 i;
00781       INT16 sWidth, sHeight, sOffsetX, sOffsetY;
00782 
00783       GetGridNoScreenPos( gsItemGridNo, 0, &sScreenX, &sScreenY );
00784 
00785       if( sScreenY > 340 )
00786             return;
00787 
00788       //Display the enlarged item graphic
00789       uiVideoObjectIndex = GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( &Item[ gpItem->usItem ] );
00790       GetVideoObject( &hVObject, uiVideoObjectIndex );
00791       
00792       sWidth = hVObject->pETRLEObject[ Item[ gpItem->usItem ].ubGraphicNum ].usWidth;
00793       sOffsetX = hVObject->pETRLEObject[ Item[ gpItem->usItem ].ubGraphicNum ].sOffsetX;
00794       xp = sScreenX + (40 - sWidth - sOffsetX*2) / 2;
00795       
00796       sHeight = hVObject->pETRLEObject[ Item[ gpItem->usItem ].ubGraphicNum ].usHeight;
00797       sOffsetY = hVObject->pETRLEObject[ Item[ gpItem->usItem ].ubGraphicNum ].sOffsetY;
00798       yp = sScreenY + (20 - sHeight - sOffsetY*2) / 2;
00799 
00800       BltVideoObjectOutlineFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, uiVideoObjectIndex, Item[ gpItem->usItem ].ubGraphicNum, xp, yp, Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(0, 140, 170)), TRUE );
00801 
00802       //Display the item name above it
00803       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
00804       SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00805       SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
00806       if( gpItem->usItem == ACTION_ITEM || gpItem->usItem == SWITCH )
00807       {
00808             BuildTriggerName( gpItem, szItemName );
00809       }
00810       else if( Item[ gpItem->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_KEY )
00811       {
00812             swprintf( szItemName, L"%S", LockTable[ gpItem->ubKeyID ].ubEditorName );
00813       }
00814       else
00815       {
00816             LoadItemInfo( gpItem->usItem, szItemName, NULL );
00817       }
00818       xp = sScreenX - (StringPixLength( szItemName, FONT10ARIAL ) - 40) / 2;
00819       yp -= 10;
00820       mprintf( xp, yp, szItemName );
00821 
00822       if( gpItem->usItem == ACTION_ITEM )
00823       {
00824             UINT16 *pStr;
00825             pStr = GetActionItemName( gpItem );
00826             xp = sScreenX - (StringPixLength( pStr, FONT10ARIALBOLD ) - 40) / 2;
00827             yp += 10;
00828             SetFont( FONT10ARIALBOLD );
00829             SetFontForeground( FONT_LTKHAKI );
00830             mprintf( xp, yp, pStr );
00831             SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00832       }
00833 
00834       //Count the number of items in the current pool, and display that.
00835       i = 0;
00836       GetItemPool( gsItemGridNo, &pItemPool, 0 );
00837       Assert( pItemPool );
00838       while( pItemPool )
00839       {
00840             i++;
00841             pItemPool = pItemPool->pNext;
00842       }
00843       xp = sScreenX;
00844       yp = sScreenY + 10;
00845       mprintf( xp, yp, L"%d", i );
00846       
00847       //If the item is hidden, render a blinking H (just like DG)
00848       if( gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].bVisible == HIDDEN_ITEM || 
00849                   gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].bVisible == BURIED )
00850       {
00851             SetFont( FONT10ARIALBOLD );
00852             if( GetJA2Clock() % 1000 > 500 )
00853             {
00854                   SetFontForeground( 249 );
00855             }
00856             mprintf( sScreenX + 16, sScreenY + 7, L"H" );
00857             InvalidateRegion( sScreenX + 16, sScreenY + 7, sScreenX + 24, sScreenY + 27 );
00858       }
00859 }
00860 
00861 void RenderEditorInfo( )
00862 {
00863       wchar_t                             FPSText[ 50 ];
00864       static INT32            iSpewWarning = 0;
00865       INT16                               iMapIndex;
00866 
00867       SetFont( FONT12POINT1 );
00868       SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
00869       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
00870 
00871       //Display the mapindex position
00872       if( GetMouseMapPos( &iMapIndex ) )
00873             swprintf( FPSText, L"   (%d)   ", iMapIndex );
00874       else
00875             swprintf( FPSText, L"          " );
00876       mprintfEditor( (UINT16)(50-StringPixLength( FPSText, FONT12POINT1 )/2), 463, FPSText );
00877 
00878       switch( iCurrentTaskbar )
00879       {
00880             case TASK_OPTIONS:
00881                   if( !gfWorldLoaded || giCurrentTilesetID < 0 )
00882                         mprintf( 260, 445, L"No map currently loaded." );
00883                   else
00884                         mprintf( 260, 445, L"File:  %S, Current Tileset:  %s", 
00885                               gubFilename, gTilesets[ giCurrentTilesetID ].zName );
00886                   break;
00887             case TASK_TERRAIN:
00888                   if( gusSelectionType == LINESELECTION )
00889                         swprintf( wszSelType[LINESELECTION], L"Width: %d", gusSelectionWidth );
00890                   DrawEditorInfoBox( wszSelType[gusSelectionType], FONT12POINT1, 220, 430, 60, 30 );
00891                   swprintf( FPSText, L"%d%%", gusSelectionDensity );
00892                   DrawEditorInfoBox( FPSText, FONT12POINT1, 310, 430, 40, 30 );
00893                   break;
00894             case TASK_ITEMS:
00895                   RenderEditorItemsInfo();
00896                   UpdateItemStatsPanel();
00897                   break;
00898             case TASK_BUILDINGS:
00899                   UpdateBuildingsInfo();
00900                   if( gusSelectionType == LINESELECTION )
00901                         swprintf( wszSelType[LINESELECTION], L"Width: %d", gusSelectionWidth );
00902                   DrawEditorInfoBox( wszSelType[gusSelectionType], FONT12POINT1, 530, 430, 60, 30 );
00903                   break;
00904             case TASK_MERCS:
00905                   UpdateMercsInfo();
00906                   break;
00907             case TASK_MAPINFO:
00908                   UpdateMapInfo();
00909                   if( gusSelectionType == LINESELECTION )
00910                         swprintf( wszSelType[LINESELECTION], L"Width: %d", gusSelectionWidth );
00911                   DrawEditorInfoBox( wszSelType[gusSelectionType], FONT12POINT1, 440, 430, 60, 30 );
00912                   break;
00913       }
00914 }
00915 
00916 //This is in ButtonSystem.c as a hack.  Because we need to save the buffer whenever we do a full
00917 //taskbar render, we need to draw the buttons without hilites, hence this flag.  This flag is
00918 //always true in ButtonSystem.c, so it won't effect anything else.
00919 extern BOOLEAN gfGotoGridNoUI;
00920 
00921 void ProcessEditorRendering()
00922 {
00923       BOOLEAN fSaveBuffer = FALSE;
00924       if( gfRenderTaskbar ) //do a full taskbar render.
00925       {
00926             ClearTaskbarRegion( 0, 360, 640, 480 );
00927             RenderTerrainTileButtons();
00928             MarkButtonsDirty();
00929             gfRenderTaskbar = FALSE;
00930             fSaveBuffer = TRUE;
00931             gfRenderDrawingMode = TRUE;
00932             gfRenderHilights = FALSE;
00933             gfRenderMercInfo = TRUE;
00934       }
00935       if( gfRenderDrawingMode )
00936       {
00937         if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_BUILDINGS || iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_TERRAIN || iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_ITEMS ) 
00938             {
00939                   ShowCurrentDrawingMode();
00940                   gfRenderDrawingMode = FALSE;
00941             }
00942       }
00943       //render dynamically changed buttons only  
00944       RenderButtons( );
00945 
00946       if( gfSummaryWindowActive )
00947             RenderSummaryWindow();
00948       else if( !gfGotoGridNoUI && !InOverheadMap() )
00949             RenderMercStrings();
00950 
00951       if( gfEditingDoor )
00952             RenderDoorEditingWindow();
00953 
00954       if( TextInputMode() )
00955             RenderAllTextFields();
00956       RenderEditorInfo();
00957 
00958       if( !gfSummaryWindowActive && !gfGotoGridNoUI && !InOverheadMap() )
00959       {
00960             if( gpItem && gsItemGridNo != -1 )
00961                   RenderSelectedItemBlownUp();
00962             if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_MAPINFO )
00963                   RenderMapEntryPointsAndLights();
00964             if( iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_PLACE_ITEM && eInfo.uiItemType == TBAR_MODE_ITEM_KEYS || 
00965                     iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_DOORKEYS )
00966                   RenderDoorLockInfo();
00967       }
00968 
00969 
00970 
00971       if( fSaveBuffer )
00972             BlitBufferToBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 360, 640, 120 );
00973 
00974       //Make sure this is TRUE at all times.
00975       //It is set to false when before we save the buffer, so the buttons don't get 
00976       //rendered with hilites, in case the mouse is over one.  
00977       gfRenderHilights = TRUE;
00978 
00979       RenderButtonsFastHelp();
00980 
00981 }
